site.name: Viblo Organization
site.slogan: Free service for technical knowledge sharing

summary.description: Viblo organization is a place where companies, teams and groups can share their perspectives, visions and development stories.

key_features.reach_wider_audience: Reach a wider audience with Viblo's growing community.
key_features.multiple_collaborators: Multiple collaborators with editors and writer roles.
key_features.ga_available: Statistics available via Google Analytics tracking.
key_features.place_on_homepage: Get a place on the home page as a featured top active organization.
key_features.get_credit: Get credit for posts made by your authors..

titles.submit_by_writers: Posts are submitted as draft by writers

contents.two_roles: Organization members are categorized into two roles:
contents.writer_explain: Regular contributors who can submit posts to the organization
contents.editor_explain: People who are in charge of reviewing posts submitted by writers
contents.will_be_reviewed: They will be reviewed, edited and get approved by editors before publishing.
contents.shown_in_both: Will be shown in both the author and the organization's news feed.
contents.credited_as_post_appears: Besides being credited to the author, the associating organization is also credited as the post appears in any feed and in the post view.
contents.ga_tracking: Users' activities on posts (interactions, views, etc) are tracked with customizable Google Analytics tracking.
contents.edit_post: Besides authors, editors and the owner of the organization can also edit the post.
